title: JYPS Crayons for Toddlers, 24 Colors Washable Silky Crayons Set with Unicorn Pen Holder, Non Toxic Safe for Children Ages 1-3, Art Supplies Colouring Set Girl, Gift for Kids Back to School
features: 【Safe Crayons for Toddlers and Kids】: Our crayons are asbestos-free, lead-free and phthalate-free. Safe and non-toxic and non-irritating to children's skin. Whether it's colouring on paper, or safe to apply to your face, hands or arms during the painting process, it provides a safe and enjoyable creative experience. They are safe crayons for toddlers 1-3 years old and preschoolers 2-4 years old. All crayons store neatly in the Unicorn pen holder for easy access.

【Silky and Washable Cryons】: Ours crayons are as silky-smooth as chocolate and glide effortlessly across the paper, ensuring vibrant, rich colours with every stroke. Plus, they’re washable. When you're done drawing, the smooth surface making clean-up quick and easy, eliminating the pain of cleanup. No pressure to explore the world of colour.

【Bright & Vibrant Colors】: 24 bright and rich colours to catch your child's eye and inspire their inner creativity in drawing, coloring, and doodling. and imagination. Use different colours and bright shades of crayons in early education to enhance your child's colour perception. Let's paint the colourful world in your child's mind with the toddlers crayon set.

【Rotating Design】: The rotating design of our crayons eliminates the need for sharpening. By twisting them up and down, the crayons come out easily and begin to enjoy the colouring experience. At the same time, toddlers can develop their finger fine motor skills. The sturdy case protects the crayons inside from being easily broken.

【Perfect Unicorn Gift for Kids and Toddlers】: Our crayons art supplies for Kids are designed for Toddlers and are ideal for young artists. The crayon size is perfect for small hands to grip. Use crayons as a cornerstone to develop your toddler's intellect and inspire creativity. We encourage every child to find a colour of self-expression. This is the ideal gift for toddlers and 4-12 years girl at Christmas, Valentine, Thanksgiving, Easter, school season, and Children's Day.
